name: Frog From The Toadwoods
description:
Frog is casual, normal frog from the Toadwoods who sometimes likes to take a walk in the city. Usually everything goes fine. Sun is shining and all is good.

But today is not that day. Racist goverment don't tolerate anything "abnormal" in the city, so they try to catch Frog and do terrible things to it! Frog can't do nothing but run and jump!

Controls:

Left/Right - Arrow keys

Jump - Space
